content.rendered:
Slit lamps providing high-level performance and usability, combined with sleek functional beauty

The 2ZL is a simple and practical slit lamp ideal for routine examinations. Designed with both comfort and practicality in mind, it provides high-level performance in a wide range of examinations from cornea to retina. The three-step magnification 2ZL provides outstanding cost performance

Designed with both comfort and practicality in mind, it provides high-level performance in a wide range of examinations from cornea to retina. The three-step magnification 2ZL provides outstanding cost performance
